attributes.review: The app took days to load and then it just gave bugs to my phone and wiped out all my memory on it! Don’t get this app it’s so bad and bad for your health.

attributes.review: I downloaded this to support my orange 🍊 king 👑 but when I downloaded this app it stole all my information 🙀🙀🙀🙀🙀! Just like tiktok 😫😫😫😫😫😫😫! Please fix this glitch so I can get back to supporting my orange king
attributes.title: Don’t download 🙀🙀🙀🙀🙀🙀🙀

attributes.review: This app is horrible! It took 3 years to download, it crashes EVERYTIME i try to use it, and it gave my phone viruses!!! i had to buy a new one, i wish i could five this app ZERO stars
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP!!!

attributes.review: This app is absolute bs ! it wouldn't even wanna download in the first place and suddenly after it DID ALL THE TVS IN MY HOUSE STARTED PLAYING THE TRUMPET , ugh i knew trump had something to do with this PLUS it collected all my data !!! Disclaimer DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!

attributes.review: The app took like 14 hours to download and started to drain my phone battery the minute it finished. If i could rate this app 0 stars i would.
attributes.title: God awful

This app is a joke, believe me folks. Trust me, I know more about apps than the generals, alright? 

I’m pretty sure this app completely fried my phone so... Yeah... Just don’t bother getting it. Pretty terrible.

attributes.review: This app is so bad kind of like out president is. it’s uncoordinated and useless. also much like trump. it takes up too much space and doesn’t even do much.
attributes.title: So bad

attributes.review: This app is the most buggy thing ever. I open it up and it started glitching. I then got a cyber alert from my security specialist saying that my PERSONAL INFO has been compromised due to a recent app download! DO NOT GET THIS APP!
attributes.title: WORST APP, SUPER BUGGY, GAVE MY INFO TO RUSSIA
